revised_title: Middle Cambrian Ctenophore Fossils from the Stephen Formation, British Columbia
tldr: The authors describe and re-examine Middle Cambrian ctenophore fossils found in the Stephen Formation, British Columbia, Canada. They discuss the differences between these fossils and those from the Devonian and Recent taxa, as well as the wider affinities of the Ctenophora in the context of metazoan evolution.
